amendment.description: Amendment sought to coordinate federal information security policy through the creation of a National Office for Cyberspace, updating information security management practices, and establishing measures for the protection of critical infrastructure from cyberattacks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in House Report 112-88 to coordinate federal information security policy through the creation of a National Office for Cyberspace, updating information security management practices, and establishing measures for the protection of critical infrastructure from cyberattacks.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 246 (Roll no. 360).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 246 (Roll no. 360).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Langevin.
